snippet.title: Otomedius Excellent Opening Trailer
snippet.description:
"No copywrite infringement intended, All rights go to Konami"

The trailer of Otomedius Excellent for XBOX. A sequel of Otomedius Gorgeous.
Its a Shoot em up style of game. Its like one of konami's best games ever made, Gradius. Only this time, Its not only the vic viper. The original ships are still there (Vic Viper, Lord British, Jade Knight, Falchion Beta, Big Core, Flintlock) but cute girls riding them! Its a pumped up, kickass upgrade of gradius!!

"No copywrite infringement intended, All rights go to Konami"
